sqls.sql: SELECT c.name,c.mobile, (select count(1) from credit_apply_info a where a.user_id=c.id), (select count(1) from apply_borrow d where d.user_id=c.id) FROM m_user c inner join t_user_invitaion b on b.user_id=c.id and b.invitation_id=#{userId}
SELECT * FROM t_daikou_order where user_id=#{userId} and card_id=#{cardId} and status <> '999' order by create_time desc
SELECT * FROM t_daikou_order where card_id=#{cardId} and status in ('0','99')
delete FROM t_daikou_order_details where order_id=#{orderId}
SELECT * FROM t_daikou_order_details where order_id=#{orderId} order by create_time
SELECT money,status,create_time,'天下付' FROM t_tianfubao_info t WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} order by create_time desc
SELECT amount,order_status,create_time,'易沣' FROM recharge_record t WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} order by create_time desc

SELECT money AS amount, `status`, create_time, '天下付' AS `qd` FROM t_tianfubao_info t WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} UNION ALL SELECT amount, order_status AS `status`, create_time, '易沣' AS `qd` FROM recharge_record t WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} order by `create_time` desc

SELECT COALESCE (sum_in, 0) - COALESCE (sum_out, 0) sum_amount FROM ( SELECT ( SELECT sum(t.amount) FROM m_user_bill t WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} AND t.type = 1 ) sum_in, ( SELECT sum(t.amount) FROM m_user_bill t WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} AND t.type = 0 ) sum_out ) a
SELECT COALESCE (sum(t.amount), 0) FROM m_user_bill t WHERE t.business_type = 2 AND t.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT t.id,t.status,m.name as user_id,t.amount,t.audit_Remark,t.create_Time, t.credit_card_amount,t.money_type,t.remark,t.provider_userid FROM t_user_money_info t left join m_user m on t.user_id=m.id WHERE t. money_Type = 3
<#if startDateStr?? && startDateStr != ""> AND t.create_time >= STR_TO_DATE( #{startDateStr}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) </#if> <#if endDateStr?? && endDateStr != ""> AND t.create_time < STR_TO_DATE( #{endDateStr}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) </#if> order by t.create_time desc
SELECT * FROM my_offline_view t WHERE 1=1 AND t.invitation_id = #{userId} order by t.date_created desc

SELECT a.create_time,a.amount,b.name,c.user_level_name FROM t_user_money_info a INNER JOIN m_user b on a.provider_userid=b.id INNER JOIN t_user_score c on b.level=c.user_level WHERE a.money_type=1 and a.user_id=#{userId} order by a.create_time desc
SELECT sum(1) FROM t_user_invitaion WHERE invitation_id= #{userId} and is_real=1
SELECT sum(1) FROM t_user_invitaion WHERE invitation_id= #{userId} and is_real=0
SELECT amount,status,create_time FROM t_user_money_info WHERE money_type=3 and user_id=#{userId} order by create_time desc
SELECT notice_context FROM t_notice WHERE status=1 order by sort

SELECT * FROM withdraw_apply_view t WHERE 1 = 1 <#if status??> AND t. STATUS = #{status} </#if> <#if userId??> AND t.user_id = #{userId} </#if> <#if startDateStr??> AND t.date_created >= STR_TO_DATE( #{startDateStr}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) </#if> <#if endDateStr??> AND t.date_created < STR_TO_DATE( #{endDateStr}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) </#if> order by t.date_created desc

SELECT t.id,t.use_Status,t.login_Name,t.name,t.mobile,t.identity_No,t.level,t.date_Created,ifnull((select count(1) from t_user_invitaion a where a.invitation_id=t.id),0) as invited_num,t.share_image_url,t.hb_share_image_url, password,password_salt,pay_pass,inviter_mobile,email,branch_code,account,id_card_face,id_card_ne,bank_card_no,bank_card_mag,last_login_time,certification,certification_date,validind,bank_name,bank_sub_name,idt_card_handle,quick_value,device_type,province,city,channel_id,nick_name,wx_photo,token,open_id FROM m_user t WHERE 1 = 1 <#if loginName?? && loginName != ""> AND t.login_name LIKE concat('%', #{loginName}, '%') </#if> <#if name?? && name != ""> AND t.NAME LIKE concat('%', #{name}, '%') </#if> <#if certification??> AND t.certification = #{certification} </#if>
<#if orderBy??> ORDER BY <@forEach data=orderBy item="it" separator=","> ${it} </@forEach> ${sort} </#if>

SELECT c.name,c.mobile,c.identity_no,c.level FROM m_user a INNER JOIN t_user_invitaion b ON b.invitation_id=a.id and a.id= #{id} inner join m_user c on b.user_id=c.id WHERE 1=1 <#if mobile??> AND c.mobile = #{mobile} </#if> ORDER BY c.date_created desc

SELECT * FROM t_notice t WHERE 1 = 1 <#if noticeContext?? && noticeContext != ""> AND t.notice_context LIKE concat('%', #{noticeContext}, '%') </#if>
ORDER BY sort asc

SELECT * FROM t_base_code t WHERE 1 = 1 <#if action?? && action != ""> AND t.action LIKE concat('%', #{action}, '%') </#if> <#if name?? && name != ""> AND t.name LIKE concat('%', #{name}, '%') </#if> <#if remark?? && remark != ""> AND t.remark LIKE concat('%', #{remark}, '%') </#if>
SELECT * FROM c_codetrans t WHERE t.codetype = #{codeType} AND t.validind = '1' ORDER BY t.display_no

SELECT t.recharge_amount, t.amount, t.invited_user_id, u.login_name invited_user_login_name, u. NAME invited_user_name, u. LEVEL invited_user_level, t.date_created FROM profit_log t, m_user u WHERE t.invited_user_id = u.id AND t.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY t.date_created desc
SELECT t.invited_user_id, sum(t.amount) amount FROM profit_log t WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY t.invited_user_id

SELECT r.type, c.codename NAME, r. LEVEL, r.rate, 20000 limit_amount FROM c_share_rate r, c_codetrans c WHERE r.type = c.CODE AND c.codetype = 'payMethod' AND c.validind='1' <#if level??> AND r.LEVEL = #{level} </#if> ORDER BY r.date_created
select * from order_view t where 1 = 1 <#if type?? && type != ""> and t.type = #{type} </#if> <#if name?? && name != ""> and t.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%') </#if>

select count(id) from t_user_invitaion where 1 = 1 <#if userId?? && userId != ""> and user_id = #{userId} </#if> <#if invitationId?? && invitationId != ""> and invitation_id = #{invitationId} </#if> <#if isReal?? && isReal != ""> and is_real = #{isReal} </#if>

SELECT IFNULL(sum(amount),0) FROM t_user_money_info WHERE 1 = 1 <#if userId?? && userId != ""> and user_id = #{userId} </#if> <#if moneyType?? && moneyType != ""> and money_type = #{moneyType} </#if> <#if status?? && status != ""> and status = #{status} </#if>

SELECT * FROM t_area_code WHERE 1 = 1 <#if type== "1"> GROUP BY province_code </#if> <#if type== "2"> and province_code = #{provinceCode} GROUP BY city_code </#if> <#if type== "3"> and city_code = #{cityCode} GROUP BY area_code </#if>
SELECT * FROM t_area_code WHERE area_code = #{areaCode}

SELECT * FROM t_sub_bank_info WHERE 1 = 1 <#if bankCode?? && bankCode != ""> and bank_code = #{bankCode} </#if> <#if subBankName?? && subBankName != ""> and sub_bank_name LIKE concat('%', #{subBankName}, '%') </#if>
SELECT * FROM t_notice WHERE 1 = 1 <#if status?? && status != ""> and status = #{status} </#if> order by sort,create_time

SELECT * FROM t_log_notice WHERE 1 = 1
order by create_time desc limit 0,5
SELECT * FROM t_big_data_info WHERE 1 = 1 and status = #{status} and user_id = #{userId} order by create_time desc
SELECT COALESCE (t.fenrun_money, 0) FROM m_user_bill t WHERE t.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM t_auth_code WHERE 1 = 1 <#if mobile?? && mobile != ""> and mobile = #{mobile} </#if> <#if isUse?? && isUse != ""> and is_use = #{isUse} </#if> order by create_time desc limit 0,1
SELECT COALESCE (sum(t.amount), 0) FROM t_user_money_info t WHERE t.money_type = 2 AND t.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COALESCE (t.tixian_money, 0) FROM m_user_bill t WHERE t.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COALESCE (sum(t.amount), 0) FROM t_user_money_info t WHERE t.money_type = 3 and t.status=1 AND t.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM t_city t WHERE t.level = 1
SELECT * FROM t_city t WHERE t.level = 2 AND t.province_id = #{provinceId}
SELECT * FROM t_city t WHERE t.level = 3 AND t.city_id = #{cityId}

select (select count(1) from t_user_invitaion a inner join m_user b on a.user_id=b.id where a.invitation_id=#{userId}), (select count(1) from t_user_invitaion a inner join m_user b on a.user_id=b.id where a.invitation_id=#{userId} and level='1'), (select count(1) from t_user_invitaion a inner join m_user b on a.user_id=b.id where a.invitation_id=#{userId} and level='2'), (select count(1) from t_user_invitaion a inner join m_user b on a.user_id=b.id where a.invitation_id=#{userId} and level='3'), (select count(1) from t_user_invitaion a inner join m_user b on a.user_id=b.id where a.invitation_id=#{userId} and level='4'), (select count(1) from t_user_invitaion a inner join m_user b on a.user_id=b.id where a.invitation_id=#{userId} and level in ('2','3','4')), (select count(1) from t_user_invitaion a inner join m_user b on a.user_id=b.id where a.invitation_id=#{userId} and to_days(date_created) = to_days(now())) from dual
SELECT * FROM sys_content where status=0 order by sort asc ,last_time desc

SELECT * FROM t_loan_info WHERE 1 = 1 <#if loanType?? && loanType != ""> and loan_type = #{loanType} </#if> <#if loanTypes??> and loan_type in ( <@forEach data=loanTypes item="loanType" separator=","> #{loanType} </@forEach> ) </#if> <#if productDimension?? && productDimension != ""> and product_dimension LIKE concat('%', #{productDimension}, '%') </#if> <#if status?? && status != ""> and status = #{status} </#if> order by sort asc
select * from t_daikou_user_card where 1 = 1 <#if sysUserId?? && sysUserId != ""> and sys_user_id = #{sysUserId} </#if> <#if type?? && type != ""> and type = #{type} </#if>
select sum(amount) from t_daikou_order_details where 1 = 1 <#if orderId?? && orderId != ""> and order_id = #{orderId} </#if> and status = '2' and op_type='1'

select credit.id, credit.order_no, credit.credit_no, credit.user_id, credit.identity_card, credit.user_name, credit.phone_no, credit.channel_code, credit.status, credit.create_date, credit.update_date from m_user u inner join credit_apply_info credit on u.id = credit.user_id where 1 = 1 <#if status??> and credit.status = #{status} </#if> <#if userIds??> and u.id in ( <@forEach data=userIds item="userId" separator=","> #{userId} </@forEach> ) </#if> <#if queryText?? && queryText != ""> and (u.name like concat('%',#{queryText},'%') or u.mobile like concat('%',#{queryText},'%')) </#if> order by credit.create_date desc
select * from t_fenrun_log where 1 = 1 <#if superiorId?? && superiorId != ""> and superior_id = #{superiorId} </#if> <#if type?? && type != ""> and type = #{type} </#if>

select id,order_no,identity_no,amount,deadline,user_name,user_id,mobile,professional,province,city,is_creditcard,is_accumulation_fund,house_type, is_car,is_insurance_policy,borrow_type,car_type,is_marriage,is_business_license,car_license,house_license,area_license,business_license,status,create_time, house_status,(select title from t_loan_info b where a.borrow_name=b.borrow_name) as borrow_name,taxes_money from apply_borrow a where 1 = 1 <#if status??> and status = #{status} </#if> <#if userIds??> and a.user_id in ( <@forEach data=userIds item="userId" separator=","> #{userId} </@forEach> ) </#if> <#if queryText?? && queryText != ""> and (a.user_name like concat('%',#{queryText},'%') or a.mobile like concat('%',#{queryText},'%')) </#if> order by create_time desc

select info.id, info.order_no, info.credit_no, info.big_data_type, info.company_name, info.big_data_back, info.status, info.create_time, info.report_id, u.mobile, u.id user_id, u.name user_name from t_big_data_info info inner join m_user u on u.id = info.user_id where 1 = 1 <#if payStatus??> and status = #{payStatus} </#if> <#if userIds??> and u.id in ( <@forEach data=userIds item="userId" separator=","> #{userId} </@forEach> ) </#if> <#if queryText?? && queryText != ""> and (u.name like concat('%',#{queryText},'%') or u.mobile like concat('%',#{queryText},'%')) </#if> order by info.create_time desc
